849240.name: Fantasy Grounds - Hellfrost Encounters Book 1 (Savage Worlds)
849240.description:
Hellfrost Encounters Book 1

BEWARE THE ROAD LESS TRAVELLED!
Designed with the busy GM in mind, this book contains 50 detailed encounters covering a variety of situations and locales.
Whether youre after a random encounter thats more than just a stand up fight on featureless terrain, an exciting mini-adventure on the spur of the moment, something to break up the partys travels, or a starting scene for an adventure of your own devising, this book has something for you.
To help speed up play, every encounter is designed to fit one or two pages containing all of its pertinent information, so there's no need to flip between pages. Lavishly illustrated with maps, everything you need to play these encounters is within the covers of this fantastic book!
Although designed for the Hellfrost setting, each encounter contains the stats required for play, so it can be used in any Savage Worlds fantasy setting!
Hellfrost is an heroic fantasy setting by Triple Ace Games and is designed for use with the award-winning Savage WorldsTM RPG.
This product includes:
  • 50 detailed encounters
  • Encounters include a wide variety of situations and locales
  • Many encounters can be used as exciting mini-adventures
  • Includes 43 Maps (some with illustrations)
Author: Paul 'Wiggy' Wade-Williams
Cartography: Robin Elliott
Fantasy Grounds Conversion: Kevin Doswell
Some links require Rassilon Expansion II and other Hellfrost products
Requires the Hellfrost Players Guide
Requirements: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and a one time purchase of the Savage Worlds ruleset.
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by: Kevin Doswell
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and a one time purchase of the Savage Worlds Adventure Edition ruleset.
